relation: Great for these types of students
Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus
campus police and campus cameras keep incidents at a minimum. First Aid stations available, rails on stairs, and snow removal is punctual.
Many clubs and activities, too many to list. There is something for everyone.

Any student that likes a community without the overwhelming sensation of University life, but with the options to participate and get actively involved. For the student who wants good classes at a good price.
none that I know of, But the campus is a smoke free campus, great tradition.

Excellent facilities, one of the green campuses that utilizes energy conservation and uses the money saved to keep campus at premium level. Great instructors and programs for a fraction of the university price.
The bars are right around the corner, sports facilities are top notch, and Rock State Park is just up the street.
There is a cafe with some decent options to hold you over throughout the day
Some of the course loads are demanding, but not without reward.
Maintain focus, take part in the campus activities, and enjoy the experience!
The facilities are up-to-date and clean. The staff is committed to your success. The college is a great first step into the land of college.
pageTitle: Harford Community College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {156395=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 41650=Fees are set to be raised in June 2012, but still a less expensive option to going to a 4 year school for all 4 years., 111098=The College maintains a historical house on the grounds called the Hays-Heighe House in which they provide many cultural events. It is beautifully decorated at Christmas time and shares various historical facts at events during the year. Ex. The War of 1812 was recently highlighted.}

Login to rate or flag the reviews Sydnee from Abingdon, MD 03/21/2011 Reviewer is A current student here. 4 of 42 Categories Comments Great for these types of students Anyone looking for a great education at a great price. Tips for prospective students Get involved: there are tons of clubs and organizations; something for everyone. Get familiar with the College Life office: they sponsor trips and do a lot of interesting cultural events. Bang
